title: The fixture "mock_gnupghome" fails at times during cleanup
body:
Recently there have been a few CI jobs failing at times during the cleanup phase of the `mock_gnupghome` fixture. An example of a job that failed in that way is:
- https://github.com/spack/spack/runs/842564816


### Steps to reproduce the issue

The error occurs sporadically during our CI jobs on Github.


### Error Message

The relevant part of the error message is:
```
[ ... ]
        # clean up, since we are doing this manually
>       shutil.rmtree(short_name_tmpdir)

lib/spack/spack/test/conftest.py:786:
_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ 
/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.5.9/x64/lib/python3.5/shutil.py:480: in rmtree
    _rmtree_safe_fd(fd, path, onerror)
/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.5.9/x64/lib/python3.5/shutil.py:438: in _rmtree_safe_fd
    onerror(os.unlink, fullname, sys.exc_info())
_ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ 

[ ... ]
```

### Information on your system
```
Current runner version: '2.263.0'
Operating System
  Ubuntu
  18.04.4
  LTS
Virtual Environment
  Environment: ubuntu-18.04
  Version: 20200625.0
  Included Software: https://github.com/actions/virtual-environments/blob/ubuntu18/20200625.0/images/linux/Ubuntu1804-README.md
[ ... ]
Successfully setup CPython (3.5.9)
```

### Additional information

- [ ] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [x] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
